javax.microedition.io
Interface InputConnection

All Superinterfaces:
Connection
All Known Subinterfaces:
CommConnection, ContentConnection, HttpConnection, HttpsConnection, PositionConnection, SecureConnection, SocketConnection, StreamConnection
public interface InputConnection
extends Connection

This interface defines the capabilities that an input stream connection must have.
